item.ns0:title: Mystery Trendy Wig Box
item.ns0:description:
Mystery Wig Box
Buy a lace front wig, get a synthetic lace front wig free. Buy a har front wig, get a synthetic hard front wig free.
NOTICE: If you return the regular wig, the gift wig should be returned as well, or the $109 will be deducted.

item.ns0:title: Ghost Bond Glue | 1.3oz Waterproof Ghost Bond XL Working for Lace and Poly Hair Systems | Ship to the U.S. ONLY
item.ns0:description:
Ghost Bond XL is used for full head application. Following on from the success of our GhostBond™ Adhesive, Pro Hair Labs have refined and developed our solution to bring you GhostBond™ XL. This unique hair adhesive has been specially formulated to protect against excessive moisture or sweat and to have a melting point higher than that of regular wig adhesive solutions, keeping your hair looking cool no matter how hot it gets. GhostBond™ XL offers an elegant solution to keep your confidence high and peace of mind intact. Developed by specialist chemists to be incredibly high performance whilst still also kind to your scalp, you can’t go wrong with GhostBond™ XL.
Always run a patch test before full application.
POLY Step 1: 1 thin coating to the hair system Step 2: 4 thin coatings to the head. Put each coat on as soon as the previous coat turns clear (around 20 seconds) Step 3: After the 4th coating, wait 7 minutes and press the hair system into place. LACE Use the same steps as above only, do not apply adhesive directly to the lace. Apply to scalp only.

item.ns0:title: Harley | Blue/ Pink Bunches Long Wavy Synthetic Lace Front Wig | Harley Quinn
item.ns0:description:
Inspired by Harley Quinzel in Suicide Squad, this hottest style features pink and blue gradient colors. It is styled central parting and the hand-tied lace throughout the front to the nape creates very natural hairline. The large defined waves sitting excellently on the shoulders bring vigor and charm. This brilliant and gorgeous low-ponytail hairstyle is certainly one to turn heads. Special Features: Ear-to-ear lace front for a more natural look. Flex Combs on the sides for a secure fit. Heat Friendly Fiber - High quality heat friendly fiber looks and feels like natural hair; plus it can be styled with heat tools. Cap Size – Impeccably tailored to fit smoothly and securely around the head, it’s ideal for an average head size. Please note: Keep the temperature between 90-140°C when using heat on the synthetic wigs.
This wig can withstand heat up to 320°F/160 °C. Please kindly note that the heat may change the hair style permanently. Color Disclaimer ** We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images/videos of the products we carry and that appear on the website, but please understand the actual color may vary slightly from your monitor. We cannot guarantee that what you see accurately portrays the color of the actual wig.

item.ns0:description:
❤Macarons is a stand out blue color, it reminds us of fun days out at theme parks and days by the pool. This wig can withstand heat up to 280°F/140 °C. Please kindly note that the heat may change the hair style permanently. item.ns0:title: Thomas | Super Thin Skin V-looped Hair Replacement System for Men (0.04-0.06mm) | Best Seller
item.ns0:description: Thomas is perfect for men with great hair loss in the front and on top. The 8*10 large base allows you to fully cover your hair loss area and you can cut it into the size you need. It is made from a transparent super thin skin base (0.05mm) which is very natural and undetectable. V-loop hair on the front 1/8\" with a graduated hairline creates a realistic appearance. If you like natural men\'s hairpieces that are easy to attach and clean then Thomas is a good choice for you. Base Design: Super Thin Skin Base Base Size: 8\"*10\" Hair Length: 6 inches Hair Density: Medium light, 95% density Hair Quality: Indian Remy Human Hair Hair Style: Free style Hair Wave: Slight wave (30mm) Front Shape: CC counter Replacement Period: 60–90 days Base thickness: 0.04-0.06mm

item.ns0:title: Kenneth | Fine Mono Hair System for Men | Lace front with Mono and Skin Hybrid | Durable
item.ns0:description:
Incorporating the classic elements of a Mono Hair System, Kenneth features a 4\"x4\" Fine Mono top, 1\" of French Lace at the front, and a two-layered Polyskin perimeter. This exquisite combination of mono, lace, and Polyskin elevates this hairpiece to a league of its own.The front lace ensures a seamlessly natural hairline, while the durable mono top promises longevity. The Polyskin structure offers a secure and lasting fit for the sides and back.Explore versatile hairstyles with ease, such as the ever-trendy messy look, saving you grooming time and allowing for more socializing. Embrace the classic charm and contemporary appeal of Kenneth. FEATURE
Base Design Fine Welded Mono with PU Cutaways
Base Size 8\'\'x10\'\'
Hair Length 6\'\'
Hair Density 130%
Hair Type Indian Remy Human Hair - Hair cuticles aligned in one direction/Less Tangling
Curl Wave Slight Wave - 30 mm Rod Size
Hair Style Free Hair Style
Bleached Knots Yes for Front Hairline
Replacement Period 8-12 Months

item.ns0:title: Mercury-- Swiss Lace Hair Replacement System for Men Most Breathable | for summer
item.ns0:description: Mercury is a full swiss lace piece. Thanks to the sheer soft lace, Mercury offers a comfortable wearing experience. The first inch of hair at the front has had the knots gently bleached to provide a natural looking hairline. The lace material is breathable and will keep you cool in hot weather. Mercury is an ideal choice for those who like to exercise or that frequently sweat. Base Design: All Swiss Lace, can be cut down to accommodate any size. Base Size: 8”*10” Hair Length: 6 inches (15.24cm) Hair Density: Medium, 90% density Hair Quality: 100% Indian Remy human hair Hair Style: Free style Hair Wave: Slight wave(30mm) Bleached Knot: All knots bleached well Replacement Period: 4-6 months

item.ns0:title: Hermes - Fine Mono Hair Replacement System for Men
item.ns0:description: Hermes is a durable hair system with a mono top and a poly perimeter. The fine mono makes Hermes strong and the poly perimeter makes Hermes easy to attach and clean. This piece has medium density, and is a great choice for men who want thick hair. Hair Density: Medium, 130% density Hair Quality: 100% Indian Remy human hair Hair Style: Free style Hair Length: 6 inches (15.24cm) Hair Wave: Slight wave(30mm) Base Size: 8”*10” Bleached Knot: No Front Shape: Front Between A and C counter Replacement Period: 60-90 days Base thickness: 0.12-0.14mm Base Design: Fine mono center 4*5”. 1.5” poly with gauze in front, scalloped front edge. Poly coating in sides and back, formatted into 3 layers. Can be cut down to any size.

item.ns0:title: Charlotte | White Blonde Balayage Remy Human Hair Lace Front Wig
item.ns0:description:
Charlotte is a flattering lace style made entirely from remy human hair, featuring a natural straight hair texture. Its unique salon-quality color, Champagne Lux, combines a sophisticated balayage blend of Ice Blonde and Beige Blonde with natural dark roots, resembling growing hair. The superior French lace top provides a natural hairline that seamlessly blends into the skin and allows for free parting. The remy human hair used is of the highest quality standard, ensuring an extensive lifespan.
Remy Human Hair – Crafted from high-quality remy human hair, this wig is long-lasting and can be freely heat-styled using curlers, flat irons, and blow dryers. UniWigs Designer Color - Champagne Lux boasts salon-quality blonde balayage coloring with dark rooting for added dimension. 150% Density – With 150% density, this wig provides voluminous and thick hair.
Color Disclaimer ** We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images/videos of the products we carry and that appear on the website, but please understand the actual color may vary slightly from your monitor. We cannot guarantee that what you see accurately portrays the color of the actual wig. ** The color codes included in the wig will be the same. However, as each piece is unique and entirely hand dyed and sewn with love, there can be some slight color variations. PLEASE DO NOT ALTER THE LACE BEFORE YOU DECIDE TO KEEP THE ITEM(S). Once the lace is altered in any way, the item cannot be exchanged or returned. There will be NO exceptions.
